title: Design System
intro: The Nomadix Adventure design system embodies the spirit of adventure and exploration, creating an interface that inspires visitors to embark on their own journey.

colorPalette.title: Color Palette
colorPalette.description: A carefully selected color system that balances adventure with reliability, evoking the natural landscapes of Baja California.

colors.name: Black (#000000)
colors.usage: Primary color for text and backgrounds

colors.name: Vibrant Orange (#F26B24)
colors.usage: Primary accent color for CTAs and key interactive elements

colors.name: Blue (#205375)
colors.usage: Secondary backgrounds and connection with nature

typography.title: Typography System
typography.description: A typography system that balances clarity with character, ensuring readable content that also captures the adventurous spirit of the brand.

fonts.name: Open Sans
fonts.usage: Used throughout the interface to maintain cohesion and readability

components.title: Components
components.description: A versatile component library designed to create engaging, informative and inspiring user experiences for adventure enthusiasts.

buttons.title: Buttons
buttons.description: Action-oriented buttons designed to inspire interaction and guide users through their journey.

types.name: Primary
types.description: Vibrant orange buttons for primary actions like registration and important calls to action
types.properties: Rounded corners, bold text, subtle hover animation

types.name: Secondary
types.description: Navy blue buttons for secondary actions
types.properties: Same dimensions as primary, different color scheme

forms.title: Forms
forms.description: User-friendly forms optimized for adventure planning and registration.

elements.name: Text Fields
elements.description: Clean, accessible input fields with clear labels and validation

elements.name: Dropdowns
elements.description: Custom-styled select components for experience levels and preferences

elements.name: Checkboxes
elements.description: Styled agreement components for waivers and terms

elements.name: Toggles
elements.description: Visual toggles for simple binary options

cards.title: Cards
cards.description: Content containers that showcase adventures, events, and testimonials.

types.name: Event Cards
types.description: Highlight upcoming adventures with engaging imagery

types.name: Feature Cards
types.description: Showcase key features and benefits of the journey

badges.title: Badges
badges.description: Visual indicators that communicate status, category, and achievements.

types.name: Experience Types
types.description: Visual categorization of different adventure experiences

navigation.title: Navigation Patterns
navigation.description: Intuitive navigation systems that guide users through their planning journey.

patterns.name: Main Navigation
patterns.description: Responsive, accessible navigation that adapts to all devices

patterns.name: Journey Map
patterns.description: Interactive pathfinding to explore the adventure routes

patterns.name: Resource Library
patterns.description: Organized access to preparation materials and guides

messages.title: Messaging System
messages.description: Clear communication framework for important updates and notifications.
